1.name: Upper Body Strength Day
1.description: Foundation building for upper body strength

exercises.notes: Prepare body for workout - arm circles, leg swings
Week 1-2: 5 reps - Progressive overload each week
Pull to lower chest - squeeze shoulder blades
Maintain straight line from head to toe
Prepare body for workout - leg swings and arm circles
Minute 3: Single-arm overhead carry + reverse lunge

3.name: Lower Body Strength Day
3.description: Foundation building for lower body strength

exercises.notes: Same rep scheme as Monday - squat below parallel
Hip hinge movement - keep bar close to body
Cat-cow stretches, World's greatest stretch, Hip circles and leg swings, Arm circles and shoulder rolls
Sun salutation A (5 rounds), Warrior sequence (30 sec holds), Triangle pose series, Twisted chair pose, Eagle pose balance, Low lunge with side stretch
Pigeon pose (2 min each side), Seated spinal twist, Happy baby pose, Legs up the wall, Savasana
Goblet squats with pulse at bottom
Focus on sleep, hydration, and meal prep for the week
Light cardio if desired: walking, easy cycling, or swimming
Prepare healthy meals for the upcoming week

1.name: Upper Body Strength Day
1.description: Week 2 - Foundation building with increased intensity

exercises.notes: Prepare body for workout - arm circles, leg swings
Week 1-2: 5 reps - Increase weight from week 1
Pull to lower chest - squeeze shoulder blades
Maintain straight line from head to toe
Prepare body for workout - leg swings and arm circles
Minute 3: Single-arm overhead carry + reverse lunge

3.name: Lower Body Strength Day
3.description: Week 2 - Foundation building for lower body strength

exercises.notes: Same rep scheme as Monday - squat below parallel
Hip hinge movement - keep bar close to body
Goblet squats with pulse at bottom

5.name: Full Body Power + AMRAP
5.description: Week 2 - Power development with conditioning finish

6.name: Yoga & Mobility Day
6.description: Week 2 - Active recovery with yoga flows

Prepare body for workout - arm circles, leg swings
Week 3-4: 4 reps - Increase weight from week 2
Pull to lower chest - squeeze shoulder blades
Minute 1: Pull-ups - push harder than week 2
Minute 2: Push-ups - push harder than week 2
Part of AMRAP circuit - push harder
Part of AMRAP circuit - push harder
Part of AMRAP circuit - push harder
Maintain straight line from head to toe
Prepare body for workout - leg swings and arm circles
Minute 3: Single-arm overhead carry + reverse lunge

3.name: Lower Body Strength Day
3.description: Week 3 - Intensification phase for lower body

exercises.notes: Hip hinge movement - keep bar close to body
Squat to overhead press combination - increase weight
Alternate arms each round - increase weight
Alternating lunges with bicep curls - increase weight
Goblet squats with pulse at bottom - increase weight
Switch arms each round - increase weight
Plank with dumbbell pull-throughs - increase pace
50lb dumbbells if available - increase weight if possible

5.name: Full Body Power + AMRAP
5.description: Week 3 - Power development with conditioning finish

exercises.notes: Focus on speed and explosiveness - increase weight
Use leg drive for power - increase weight
Box jumps or jump squats - increase height/intensity
Part of 20-minute AMRAP finisher - increase pace
Scale as needed - push for more reps
Maintain form - push for more reps
Squat to calf raise combination - increase pace
Shoulder emphasis - push for more reps
Repeat of Round 1 - maintain high intensity
